attributes.action: Bring Back National Service For Those Not Wanting To Work
attributes.additional_details: Looking at at the Riots in London its a disgrace, this country has lost its ability to control, the police are penned against if they go in heavy handed and are to be penned if they dont, they cant win! we need to bring dicipline back to our streets and for the yobs who dont care about our country and those who just cant be bothered getting a job, its about time someone stands up and puts the GREAT back into Britain!!!
